divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a concert,when i noticed an object in the sky comeing from the northeast.I could not tell what it was,but enormously large.My reaction was that ofpuzzlement,when my girl said, oh my god its a u.f.o.,as it was going by we justobserved it,we were just kind of Mesmerized by it.after it was out sight we justdiscussed what it was.The object was about 1 mile long 600 feet wide,moveingslowly at tree top level,no noise,heading s.west.after looking at it for 15-20minutes it just got so far away we could not see it,but we could still see thelight trail until it to disapeard. The object was glowing like the colour ofmetal ore,magma,it had structure to it,but looked like it was put together likea jig saw puzzel,it looked ancient,pocked marked and very old.,
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Bonner Springs
There were no other sightings in Bonner Springs on or around May 21st 1991
